## DefaultSeoProps interface


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DefaultSeoProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [dangerouslySetAllPagesToNoFollow](./gatsby-plugin-next-seo.defaultseoprops.dangerouslysetallpagestonofollow.md) | <code>boolean</code> | It has the prefix of <code>dangerously</code> because it will <code>nofollow</code> all pages. As this is an SEO plugin, that is kinda dangerous action. It is \*\*not\*\* bad to use this, just please be sure you want to <code>nofollow</code> \*\*EVERY\*\* page. You can still override this at a page level if you have a use case to <code>follow</code> a page. This can be done by setting <code>nofollow: false</code>. |
|  [dangerouslySetAllPagesToNoIndex](./gatsby-plugin-next-seo.defaultseoprops.dangerouslysetallpagestonoindex.md) | <code>boolean</code> | It has the prefix of <code>dangerously</code> because it will <code>noindex</code> all pages. As this is an SEO plugin, that is kinda dangerous action. It is \*\*not\*\* bad to use this, just please be sure you want to <code>noindex</code> \*\*EVERY\*\* page. You can still override this at a page level if you have a use case to <code>index</code> a page. This can be done by setting <code>noindex: false</code>. |
|  [defaultOpenGraphImageHeight](./gatsby-plugin-next-seo.defaultseoprops.defaultopengraphimageheight.md) | <code>number</code> | The default open graph image height. |
|  [defaultOpenGraphImageWidth](./gatsby-plugin-next-seo.defaultseoprops.defaultopengraphimagewidth.md) | <code>number</code> | The default open graph image width. |
|  [defaultOpenGraphVideoHeight](./gatsby-plugin-next-seo.defaultseoprops.defaultopengraphvideoheight.md) | <code>number</code> | The default open graph video height. |
|  [defaultOpenGraphVideoWidth](./gatsby-plugin-next-seo.defaultseoprops.defaultopengraphvideowidth.md) | <code>number</code> | The default open graph video width. |
